ul.li: Text mining within the elements TEI ➞ body ➞ div

Attributes values:
Traditionally proposed in TEI-XML: structuralUnit
for structural unit of the preparation to a hermeneutics: whatAction|whatResult|whatCharacter|whatRole|whatContext|whatSphere|whatBehavior

conbody.p:
Structural unit of the interpretation according to analytical taxonomies primary data, objective variables, subjective variables:
<interpGrp resp="#Bigot-Juloux" xml:id="hermeneutics" type="structuralUnit" ana="#taxonomies"> <!-- ref --> <interp n="1" xml:id="whatAction" ana="#primaryData #objectiveVar #action #verb.category"/> <interp n="2" xml:id="whatResult" ana="#objectiveVar #result"/> <!-- castList > castItem --> <interp n="3" xml:id="whatCharacter" who" ana="#primaryData #objectiveVar #Character #Genetic-sex"/> <interp n="4" xml:id="whatRole" ana="#objectiveVar" #role /> <!-- view --> <interp n="5" xml:id="whatContext" ana="#objectiveVar" #context"/> <interp n="6" xml:id="whatSphere" ana="#objectiveVar #sphere"/> <!-- stage --> <interp n="7" xml:id="whatBehavior" ana="#subjectiveVar #consequence #EmotionCategory #hasEmotionIntensity #degreeDesire #voluntaryIntent">How acts the animated entity</interp> </interpGrp>
